description:
A company is looking for a Vice President, Business Development, focused on making mental health radically accessible through advanced technologies, including a mental health ally leveraging NLP & ML for better engagement and outcomes.

Key Responsibilities
• Independently identify high-potential business prospects to support top-of-funnel goals
• Engage and motivate C-suite/Senior executives to prioritize AI mental health solutions
• Negotiate seven-figure contracts and surpass annual targets for acquiring new health system and health plan partners

Required Qualifications
• Experience in leading, designing, and negotiating 5-10 digital health partnerships, ideally with an innovative product (preferably AI) serving Payer and Provider systems
• Proven track record in consultative sales approach, focusing on solving client problems and adding real value
• Resilience and creativity in progressing despite ambiguity, with the ability to adapt strategies for commercial success
• Customer-centric approach with a deep understanding of the product, customers, values, and vision for transforming mental health care
• Strong collaborative skills, working across various disciplines and bringing market knowledge into the organization
